name: Station Escape
description: Use your xbox or ps4 controller or the keyboard (WASD and Arrows) to escape the space station.  To escape you must collect the trophy (you'll know it when you see it) but first you must destroy the lairs of all of the enemies in each of 12 rooms and in each room once you destroy all of the lairs you will receive a key which unlocks the door to let you escape the room.  Try it and you'll get the hang of it quickly.
